info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pender, southeastern Bladen, central Brunswick and Columbus Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lagoon to Bethel. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Rowan, Tabor City, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Northwest, Sandyfield, Makatoka, Point Caswell, Freeland, Hallsboro, Long Creek, Nakina, Redbug, Exum, Bughill, Council, Williams, Currie and Wards Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
